amendment.description: An amendment numbered 80 printed in Part B of House Report 118-602 to prohibit funds from being used to implement, administer, or enforce the final rule entitled "National Emission Standards for Hazardous Air Pollutants: Lime Manufacturing Plants Technology Review".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Palmer amendment (A043) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Palmer amendment (A043) Agreed to by voice vote.
